005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.library;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.DynamicContext;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.ISequence;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.MetapathConstants;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.FunctionUtils;
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.IArgument;
013import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.IFunction;
014import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.IItem;
015import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IIntegerItem;
016import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IStringItem;
017
018import java.util.List;
019
020import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
021
022/**
023 * Implements <a href=
024 * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-compare">fn:compare</a>.
025 */
026public final class FnCompare {
027
028  @NonNull
029  static final IFunction SIGNATURE = IFunction.builder()
030      .name("compare")
031      .namespace(MetapathConstants.NS_METAPATH_FUNCTIONS)
032      .deterministic()
033      .contextDependent()
034      .focusIndependent()
035      .argument(IArgument.builder()
036          .name("comparand1")
037          .type(IStringItem.class)
038          .zeroOrOne()
039          .build())
040      .argument(IArgument.builder()
041          .name("comparand2")
042          .type(IStringItem.class)
043          .zeroOrOne()
044          .build())
045      .returnType(IIntegerItem.class)
046      .returnZeroOrOne()
047      .functionHandler(FnCompare::execute)
048      .build();
049
050  private FnCompare() {
051    // disable construction
052  }
053
054  @SuppressWarnings("unused")
055  @NonNull
056  private static ISequence<IIntegerItem> execute(
057      @NonNull IFunction function,
058      @NonNull List<ISequence<?>> arguments,
059      @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext,
060      IItem focus) {
061    IStringItem comparand1 = FunctionUtils.asTypeOrNull(arguments.get(0).getFirstItem(true));
062    IStringItem comparand2 = FunctionUtils.asTypeOrNull(arguments.get(1).getFirstItem(true));
063
064    ISequence<IIntegerItem> retval;
065    if (comparand1 == null || comparand2 == null) {
066      retval = ISequence.empty();
067    } else {
068      IIntegerItem result = IIntegerItem.valueOf(comparand1.compareTo(comparand2));
069      retval = ISequence.of(result);
070    }
071    return retval;
072  }
073}
